Display - package Display
 
displayBoard(Square[][]) - Method in class gameElement.Game
This method allows to print the position of each square and puts a different color for the square which has a pawn on it.
displayBoard() - Method in class gameElement.Game
This method prints in the console the grid with the pawn.
displayBoolean() - Method in class gameElement.Game
This method allows to print the position of the square and put a special color the busy square.
displayGrid() - Method in class Display.DisplayMyGrid
This method allows to display the grid on the frame with the current game.
DisplayMyGrid - Class in Display
This method allows to display the grid of the current game.
DisplayMyGrid(String, String, Mode, boolean, int[][], int[][], int[], String) - Constructor for class Display.DisplayMyGrid
